rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {0099, 1759, 2677}

description: This unit is a core unit for the MFM (research stream) and is designed to assist students in the development of their research project. It covers such issues as starting a project, measurement, project management, applying to an institutional ethics committee for approval to conduct a research project, funding a research project, statistical planning, data analysis, collaborative research, and research in general practice.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
